description:
Pandas and matplotlib are two staples of the Python ecosystem and
fundamental if you're delving into the world of data science.

In this tutorial, we'll dispense with the typical and uninteresting data
sets or highly theoretical introductions, and instead we'll use data
from the `Pokémon franchise <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pokémon>`__
to provide a fun, hands-on introduction to the basics of data science
with pandas and matplotlib.

You don't need to be a Pokémon enthusiast or connoisseur to join! All
you need to know is that this won't be your typical pandas tutorial.
title: The Pokémon trainer's guide to pandas and matplotlib
